MedalAnnihilation.name: Annihilation
MedalAnnihilation.description: Defeat an entire squad by yourself.

MedalAssassin.name: Assassin
MedalAssassin.description: Defeat an enemy with a headshot without taking damage.

MedalDeadeye.name: Deadeye
MedalDeadeye.description: Defeat an enemy with a headshot.

MedalFirstBlood.name: First Blood
MedalFirstBlood.description: Defeat the first opponent in a match.

MedalFrenzy.name: Frenzy
MedalFrenzy.description: Defeat 5 opponents with a single weapon in a match.

MedalLastManStanding.name: Last Man Standing
MedalLastManStanding.description: Defeat the last opponent in a match.

MedalLongshot.name: Longshot
MedalLongshot.description: Defeat an enemy from at least 200 meters.

MedalPunisher.name: Punisher
MedalPunisher.description: Deal 300 damage with a single weapon in a match.

MedalRampage.name: Rampage
MedalRampage.description: Defeat 10 opponents with a single weapon in a match.
